description: Follow live text commentary, score updates, in-play clips and match stats from Coleraine vs Cliftonville in the Irish Premiership
title: Coleraine draw with Reds at Showgrounds
title_page: Irish Premiership highlights: Coleraine draw with Reds at Showgrounds - BBC Sport
maintext:
Final whistle
No goals at the Showgrounds as Coleraine and Cliftonville play out a stalemate but we got three in the east Antrim derby.
Carrick took the lead but champions Larne hit back to take the three points.
We hope you enjoyed it but that's all from us for now.
Thanks for your company.
FULL-TIME
Coleraine 0-0 Cliftonville
All over at the Showgrounds where it ends scoreless.
Neither side did enough in the final third to break the deadlock so it's a point apiece for two teams struggling for league wins in recent weeks.
